page.title: 07Launceston Leisure Centre
page.content: Our questionnaire was designed to discover the maximum about our leisure centre. Out of 142 people who were asked 63 were men and 79 were women.The ages of the men ranged from under 10 to over 65.The ages of the women were the same.125 out of 142 people said that the pool was their favourite facility. The next favourite was the squash followed by keep fit,tennis,solarium and yoga. The most popular time was in the morning.The majority of people using the leisure centre came from Launceston.Most people who answered the questionnaire were very pleased with the pool and all the other facilities, but some people were displeased with the changing facilities and wished they were better
